channel.title: Weird error!
channel.description:
i get this error when using moparscape
[code] Playing 0-hangar.mid Error downloading news Exception in thread "Thread-6" java.lang.NullPointerException at client.method34(client.java:1360) at client.method146(client.java:11914) at client.method102(client.java:7747) at client.method9(client.java:8620) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:126) at client.run(client.java:4450) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Press any key to continue . . [/code] .
i run my server and then start-up moparscape to view it and it starts the screen is black and just freezes at loading-please wait text (one of those has the server error just look for one that has arranscape at top of pic !) i also get a server error at same time !
some pics attached

@xerozcheez wrote:

Last pic is cos of the lag and the others Iâ€™m not sure about lolz.
